forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 27. North northwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 41. North northeast wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers after 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. East wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 9am, then rain showers between 9am and 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 61. East southeast wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday

Cloudy, with a high near 37. East wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. nubsNob.date: Closed due to a widespread power outage and major ice storm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments:
We are closed due to a widespread power outage. A major ice
storm has brought down thousands of trees in the area. It looks like power will not return for at least a few days. Updates will be posted here. Please stay safe and do not attempt to travel to Nub's Nob until it is safe to do so.
